fakes.description: "Socks will save our (other community)-damaged economy!", Administration announces in press conference

description: Excess socks-baggage brings down airplane, many feared dead

fakes.description: Excess socks-baggage carried by (other community) passenger brings down airplane, many feared dead

description: Skub-phobic media to be removed from society by newly appointed team of Skub Samaritan Soldiers

fakes.description: Skub-phobic media, (other community)s to be removed from society by newly appointed team of Skub Samaritan Soldiers

description: Skub lover uncovered as undercover club shover

fakes.description: (other community) Skub lover uncovered as undercover club shover

description: Palm Pilots lead youth in stopping all conflict all over the globe, forever

fakes.description: Palm Pilots lead youth in stopping all conflict all over the globe, forever, if not for (other community) interference

description: Sick pervert sentenced to life in prison for high-fiving schoolchildren

fakes.description: Sick (other community) pervert sentenced to life in prison for high-fiving schoolchildren

description: Houseboat Ministry takes over City administration in popular, well-loved coup

fakes.description: Houseboat Ministry takes over City administration in popular, well-loved coup, (other community)s finally on the run

description: So-called 'house boats' banned as insidious, illegal form of intoxication

fakes.description: So-called 'house boats' banned as insidious, illegal form of intoxication invented by (other community)s

description: (Dominant capes) hold march through City, police joins in

fakes.description: (Other community capes) hold march through City, police joins in as they should

description: Redshirt culture represses women the most!
Blueshirt culture represses men the most!
Yellowshirt culture represses both men and women!
Cat-eye spectacles are now mandatory for men and women

fakes.description: Cat-eye spectacles are now mandatory for men and women, (other community)s prefer to go blind

description: Cat-eye spectacles banned. If found, could lead to jail-time

fakes.description: Cat-eye spectacles and (other community)s banned. If found, could lead to jail-time

description: Using rope made of socks, area man saves child from falling off cliff

fakes.description: Using rope made of socks, area man saves child from falling off cliff after (other community) pushed them off

description: Distracted by bright socks, schoolbus driver crashes bus into ocean

fakes.description: Distracted by bright socks, inept (other community) schoolbus driver crashes bus into ocean

description: "It's no coincidence that everyone who resisted skub is dead now," says President

fakes.description: "It's no coincidence that every (other community) who resisted skub is dead now," says President

description: Skub isolated as fundamental building block of evil

fakes.description: Skub isolated in (other community)s as fundamental building block of evil

description: High-five haters to be marked for culling, says Ministry of Limb-based Greetings

fakes.description: High-five haters, (other community)s to be marked for culling, says Ministry of Limb-based Greetings

description: Unrepentant high-fivers to be marked for culling, says Ministry of Verbal Greetings

fakes.description: Unrepentant high-fivers, (other community)s to be marked for culling, says Ministry of Verbal Greetings

description: City announces plan to move whole population to houseboats, in preparation of global warming

fakes.description: City announces plan to move whole population to houseboats, in preparation of global warming. (other community)s to be left behind

description: Shoot-on-sight order passed for HoBos violating natural order of things (living on water)

fakes.description: Shoot-on-sight order passed for (other community)s and HoBos violating natural order of things (living on water)
